We Handle Motorcycle Accident Injury Claims

Some of the worst traffic accident injuries are those involving motorcycles. Such accidents often cause catastrophic head and traumatic brain injuries.

If you or a loved one is injured in a motorcycle accident, reach out to a Columbus motorcycle accident attorney at Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC.

Representing Those Injured In Motorcycle Accidents For 50 Years

Our law firm has represented Columbus, Ohio, individuals injured in motorcycle and other auto accidents for 50 years.

Our attorneys have over 100 years of combined experience and have obtained multimillion-dollar verdicts for injured parties and their families.

When you or a loved one has suffered a catastrophic injury, we will work hard to get you the necessary compensation for past, present and future medical care.

Our Approach To Handling Your Motorcycle Injury Claim

Along with our experience, you can expect the following from our team of lawyers:

  • Personal solutions: Since each situation is different, every case is handled differently.
  • Accident investigation: We aim to get to the bottom of what happened and will do what it takes, including interviewing witnesses and reviewing accident reports.
  • Monitoring of progress throughout your treatment: We will encourage and monitor all necessary medical treatment you need to get back on your feet.
  • Review of all medical reports: We work with a team of medical experts who will thoroughly examine the medical records involved in your case to determine the extent of your injury and prognosis for recovery as it relates to getting you compensation.
  • Trial preparation: We will attempt to negotiate a fair settlement for your injuries, but if that isn’t feasible, will take your case to trial if necessary.
  • Status reports: Clients often have recurring questions and concerns regarding their cases. We will make sure you are always kept up to date regarding the status of your case.

Let Our Experienced Attorneys Handle Your Case So You Can Focus On Getting Better. Call 614-360-2706 Today.

Our primary objective is to help you put your life back together. Contact our lawyers now to discuss your case and how we can help you.

We offer a free initial consultation. Additionally, there will be no legal fees unless we recover compensation for you.

We also handle wrongful death cases for families that have lost loved ones in motorcycle accidents. Learn more.
